thread.title: White House expects North Korea summit to happen despite silence

title: White House expects North Korea summit to happen despite silence
text:
White House expects North Korea summit to happen despite silence 4:04pm IST - 01:08 
Sanders says the administration fully expects a meeting with North Korea despite Pyongyang's silence while Tillerson says that several steps will be necessary to hash out the details. No reporter narration.
